item.description:
Attention Metro West members! Now you can enjoy the Metro West meetings from the comfort of your own home. And, meetings are now FREE of charge.
The Metro West Investors meetup will be offering webinars and teleconferences to all members. All seminars will be free and you can listen in right at home.

There will be no meeting at the Hotel. However you can network through our mailing list which is available to everyone. We are opening up the list to anyone who wants it. You can also communicate to the group through our discussion board.

If you have any questions please let me know but on Tuesday night we will be having a teleconference on a special investment program that offers great returns and minimal effort!

Conference instructions will follow shortly but feel free to email me with any questions.
Thanks,

-Peter

group.name: Metro West Investors - Boston area Real Estate Group

item.name: Fall Meeting
